name: Bullet Mojo
description:
Bullet Mojo was the game we made for the 2021 Indie-Tales-Jam!

Space to dash, you get a little bit of invulnerability so use it to your advantage!

E to shout, this will destroy bullets in your surrounding area.

You play as a little shirtless-man who must survive an onslaught of bullets coming from the walls. The catch is that YOU place the very turrets that are out to get you.

Art by CombatByrd!
